name: Calculus I
description: Introduction to calculus, covering topics such as limits, derivatives, and integrals.

name: Calculus II
description: Continuation of Calculus I, covering topics such as integration techniques, applications of integration, and infinite series.

name: Linear Algebra
description: Introduction to linear algebra, covering topics such as vector spaces, linear transformations, systems of linear equations, and matrices.

name: Multivariable Calculus
description: Introduction to multivariable calculus, covering topics such as partial derivatives, multiple integrals, and vector calculus.

name: Differential Equations
description: Introduction to differential equations, covering topics such as first-order equations, higher-order equations, series solutions, and numerical methods.
